title: エンジェルナンバー「000」に隠されたパワフルな意味とは? (Harper's BAZAAR)
text:
By now, you know the universe can sometimes send messages to you. Angels may use numbers in this process to let you know they are watching over you, ready to guide you on your journey towards
spiritual enlightenment and personal growth.
You're probably familiar with common
angel numbers, like 1111 or 444, but rarely do people think about the number zero. However, seeing a triple-zero sequence carries a profound spiritual significance. In this article, experts will help us explore the symbolism behind 000, in addition to its transformative power for when you encounter it.
"Through this number, the angels are encouraging you to trust in your intuition, abilities and talents," says
Linda Berry, “angel whisperer,” spiritual coach and owner of the Spiritual Discovery Center in Southern California. "They believe in you and want you to do the same and want to help you achieve harmony between your personal, professional, and spiritual pursuits."
Number 0 meaning in numerology
According to Mystic Michaela, author of
The Angel Numbers Book, podcast host of Know Your Aura with Mystic Michaela!, "Angel number 0 represents unconditional love. It reminds us that the force of love is around you all the time, taking the form of other people, opportunities, and even moments of clarity."
If you see a 0 with another number, Mystic Michaela says it only enhances all the attributes of that other numbers it appears with.
What does angel number 000 mean?
When you see 0 in a series of three, it adds the vibration of infinite potential, says Berry. Now, how you handle that transitional period will only depend on you: How open-minded are you to new opportunities? Are you ready and willing for
self-improvement? "It requires taking practical steps to reach tangible goals; it's not a number based on hoping and wishing things to realty," says Berry. "In a deeper sense, number 0 represents wisdom and knowledge learned from teachings and life experiences to assist in spiritual growth."
And because the number 0 is also about unconditional love, the number “000” represents the unbounded power of the universe and its potential. "This number is the universe number," says Mystic Michaela. "It signifies the all encompassing power around you that appears in infinite abundance."
According to
Alex Getts, an astrologer and tarot reader of nearly 20 years, "It's about the start of a new cycle or journey, similar to how the Fool is the 0 Tarot card of the Major Arcana."
"In numerology, 000 pertains to a connection with the higher power and entering the journey to step closer to enlightenment," Getts also points out. "Seeing them, simply put, indicates a new beginning or new cycle in this process."
If you encounter 000 frequently, your angels are reminding you of your potential. That means, it's time to tap into your energy source to get what you need.
Love and your twin flame
When it comes to relationships of all kinds — romantic and
twin flame — you should trust the angel wisdom because it will guide you towards harmony and balance. "This number carries energies of trust, communication, and compromise, which are essential elements for a successful partnership," Berry explains.
In your love life, 000 should encourage you to be open and honest with your feelings. "This openness allows for deeper, more meaningful connections with partners," Berry says.
If you're single or dating, however, Berry says 000 serves as a reminder to be mindful of your own needs while also being receptive to the possibilities of new love.
Career and finances
The good news is, you will find success and happiness in your work if you see 000 repeatedly. "Angels are always watching over you and are ready to support you in your quest for personal finance and career success," says Berry. "This number indicates that you're on the right track in your career journey and should continue to pursue your goals with faith in spiritual guidance."
And while you're on the correct path, you're also responsible for making things happen for yourself. You may need to explore new opportunities or make important decisions to steer you in the right direction. Angel numbers are not usually passive scenarios. Part of the work is on you!
"It’s essential to be adaptable and open to change," Berry advises. "Identify necessary adjustments in your life and career path, and most importantly, trust your intuition in making transformative decisions."
Health
Mystic Michaela points out that 000 is asking you to level up in all areas of your life, including your health. "It is a nudge to get moving on some goals you may have left to the wayside while life got in the way," she says. Try starting a new workout or pay a visit to a wellness professional or therapist to assist you in answering this call from your angels.
Berry also reminds that "this number encourages you to create a harmonious environment in your personal life, establish a work-life balance, and prioritize self-care and personal well-being." Again, it's that leveling up your life, but you being engaged to steer yourself towards positive change.
"Understanding your own strengths and weaknesses is vital in following this angel number guidance," Berry adds. "It wants you to recognize the value of self-awareness in personal health... Focusing on your physical and mental well-being is important during your journey, and seeing number 000 is a reminder to prioritize health."
What should you do if you keep seeing angel number 000?
Think of it as a "clean slate" — whether it comes to finance, love, career, or any of your relationships for that matter.
"If you keep seeing 000, take the leap of faith you've been considering," says Getts. "Start that new business, go to that new place. It's not necessarily going to be easy, but it will give you the lessons you need to evolve personally and spiritually."
Mystic Michaela says you can start to create the reality you desire by doing the following upon seeing 000:
- Sit down and write a list of intentions.
- Update your vision board.
- Be mindful of how your actions and words back up your goals and dreams.
Following the message of this number will make you equipped to face life’s challenges, Berry says. You'll be unlocking your potential for personal and spiritual development, so get ready!
Ysolt Usigan is a lifestyle writer and editor with 15+ years of experience working in digital media. She has created share-worthy content for publishers
Shape, What To Expect, Cafe Mom, TODAY, CBS News, HuffPo, The Bump, Health, Ask Men, and Best Gifts. A working mom of two, her editorial expertise in parenting, shopping, and home are rooted in her everyday life.
